author: radekkapka
content:
I think I found a spec violation in Lighthouse. When sending a pre-Electra attestation to `/eth/v2/beacon/pool/attestations` I get

> "BAD_REQUEST: body deserialize error: Error(\\\"missing field `committee_index`\\\"

But the v2 endpoint should support both pre- and post-Electra requests

author: nflaig
content: there was some discussion here https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/531, I don't think Lighthouse supports pre-electra anymore

author: nflaig
content: most clients don't I would assume due to removing eth1 deposit code, so you can't build blocks pre-electra anymore

author: 0xunclebill
content: yes, we do not support pre-electra attestations anymore
